media:group.media:title: The Great Smash Bros Conspiracy
media:group.media:description:
A recent leak has changed everything about how thousands of people see Nintendo. I could never have imagined that a company I've supported all my life could be so sneaky and deceitful to its fans.
I don't want to support them anymore.
#SaveSmash #FreeMelee
(link to the leak in pinned comment)

entry.title: How to FAIL as a Youtuber

media:group.media:title: How to FAIL as a Youtuber
media:group.media:description:
If you were to ask me three years ago what it meant to be successful on youtube, I would have told you it was all about views and subscribers... but I was wrong.
This is what happens when you cater to the algorithm...
This is the story of how I failed as a Youtuber.
JOIN MY DISCORD --------------- https://discord.gg/st6YfP2
Follow Me On Twitter ----------- https://twitter.com/SlushTV_
(all 8-bit remixes are composed by 8bit Jazz who is amazing go check him out)

entry.title: The Twitch Moments That Changed History

media:group.media:title: The Twitch Moments That Changed History
media:group.media:description:
After discovering a dating app that copies Twitch, I realized that the platform has grown to a point where it's influencing our culture in ways I couldn't even imagine. This video is an exploration of that influence.
Special Thanks to NotKarar for helping with research.
Music ------------------------------ Lee Rosevere - What's in the Barrel - Don't Trust the Cloud - Where Was I - Under the Blanket of Night

#Twitch #POF

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: Twitch's First Big Streamer - The History of Reckful

media:group.media:title: Twitch's First Big Streamer - The History of Reckful
media:group.media:description:
Reckful is known for many things. He's the original big Twitch streamer, a legendary World of Warcraft player and one of the most innovative streamers in the game.
But perhaps his greatest obstacle is overcoming his dark past.
